name: SWAT Team Elite Force Rescue Mission: Special Ops
name_original: SWAT Team Elite Force Rescue Mission: Special Ops
description:
Captain we got a hostile situation!


Terrorist group kidnapped civilians and they transported hostages to different locations
City police is not trained for this situation it's time for SWAT force to save civilians in crisis situation
Play SWAT Team Elite Force Rescue Mission action packed brand new 3D simulator game
Target enemies mercenary and ex military forces, take aim and pull trigger to kill them all in superb FPS game play. Enjoy most thrilling anti terrorist shooting game.


Download SWAT Team Elite Force Rescue Mission with action packed thrilling game play like never before.
